meanings.definition: Present or explain (something) in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She reframes the story to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: He often reframes complex ideas into simpler terms for his students.
meanings.sent3: The comedian reframes the punchline to get a bigger laugh.
meanings.sent4: In his speech, the politician reframes the issue to gain more support.
meanings.sent5: The artist reframes reality through their unique perspective.

meanings.sent1: After years, she reframes the old family photo for display.
meanings.sent2: He decides to reframe the artwork to match the new decor.
meanings.sent3: The photographer reframes the image to highlight a different subject.
meanings.sent4: She reframes the painting to enhance its visual impact.
meanings.sent5: The art collector reframes the masterpiece to preserve its beauty.
